content: this legal text involves a case handled by a notary named june the case is a divorce between a technician and his exwife and a disabled woman and her exhusband the court has issued a judgment for a mutual consent divorce which includes the distribution of immovable property specifically an apartment building in ypres the details of the property and the ownership rights of the parties are described the parties have also agreed to a settlement of their rights which has been recorded by a notary the completion of the divorce is still pending and the property distribution will become final once the divorce is completed the document also discusses the estimated value of the property and the tax consequences of the transaction it confirms that the parties have complied with the obligations imposed by the mortgage act the document concludes by mentioning the fee for the rights writings and confirms that the deed has been read and explained to the parties involved
